long: Meaning: properly, a "part" of; hence (prepositionally), "from" or "out of" in many senses.  Usage: above, after, among, at, because of, by (reason of), from (among), in, × neither, × nor, (out) of, over, since, × than, then, through, × whether, with.  Source: or "מִנִּי"; or "מִנֵּי"; (constructive plural) (Isaiah 30:11); for "H4482";
